title: Standup Comedy - Robert Klein - Child of the 50's
description:
Robert Klein - Child of the 50&#039;s

Review by Richie Unterberger 
As the title indicates, many of the routines here originate from Robert Klein&#039;s experiences growing up in New York in the 1950s. He&#039;s equally comfortable, however, taking on then-current targets like stoned FM disc jockeys and inane television commercials, or whimsically making fun of late-19th century president James Garfield. Because so many of his sources are so common to the American experience ÃƒÂ¢?? neurotic schoolteachers, the idiocy of mainstream media, and starting your car in the dead of winter ÃƒÂ¢?? the jokes remain funny decades later.
